pagename: Money making guide/Killing the Grotesque Guardians
title: Killing the Grotesque Guardians

properties.name: description
properties.value: The listed profit rate assumes 24 kills per hour, but over 30 is possible with maxed stats and gear. Your expected profit will vary depending on your kills per hour.

content:
Killing Grotesque Guardians
Requirements
Skills
  • 75
  • 90+
  • 43+
Items
  • Weapons: Abyssal Whip or better for Dusk, Toxic Blowpipe for Dawn
  • Special attack weapon: crystal halberd, Saradomin godsword or dragon claws
  • Armour: Slayer helmet (i), Melee equipment and Ranged equipment
  • Food & Potions: Sharks, Divine super combat potions, Prayer potions, Divine ranging potions
  • Other: A rock hammer or equivalent
  • See Grotesque Guardians/Strategies for detailed equipment.
    • Quest
    Priest in Peril
    Other
    Having unlocked the roof with a brittle key
    A gargoyle slayer task
    King's Ransom and having completed the Knight Waves Training Grounds to use Piety is recommended
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    895,647 43,200 43,200 28,800 32,400
    Inputs (447,972)Outputs (1,343,619)
    3 × Divine super combat potion(4) (54,654)3 × Divine ranging potion(4) (11,088)10 × Prayer potion(4) (115,650)70 × Shark (65,940)800 × Zulrah's scales (148,800)160 × Amethyst dart (51,840)0.19 × Granite maul (22,485)0.096 × Granite gloves (2,767)0.096 × Granite ring (1,829)0.064 × Granite hammer (5,838)0.048 × Black tourmaline core (133,470)3.5 × Mushroom potato (3,216)5.61 × Saradomin brew(4) (41,696)2.1 × Magic potion(2) (96.7)0.35 × Ranging potion(2) (80.93)2.1 × Super combat potion(2) (12,802)2.1 × Prayer potion(4) (24,312)2.1 × Rune pickaxe (39,252)1.75 × Rune full helm (36,095)1.75 × Rune platelegs (66,398)1.4 × Rune 2h sword (53,124)1.05 × Rune battleaxe (25,750)0.35 × Dragon longsword (20,729)0.35 × Adamant boots (383)0.35 × Dragon med helm (20,714)110 × Gold ore (33,109)68.32 × Adamantite bar (137,804)452 × Coal (73,219)92.5 × Gold bar (7,862)84.09 × Mithril bar (60,459)6.31 × Runite ore (69,492)4.2 × Runite bar (52,395)350 × Chaos rune (24,175)140 × Death rune (26,067)28.03 × Dragon dart tip (83,555)131 × Diamond bolt tips (24,175)21.02 × Dragonstone bolt tips (8,156)5.26 × Onyx bolt tips (43,200)26.28 × Dragon arrowtips (45,434)96,350 × Coins (96,350)1.75 × Crystal key (35,306)0.0096 × Jar of stone (11,822)

    The listed profit rate assumes 24 kills per hour, but over 30 is possible with maxed stats and gear. Your expected profit will vary depending on your kills per hour.


    The most expensive Grotesque Guardian drops are the Granite maul (117,108), Black tourmaline core (2,780,631), and the Jar of stone (1,231,475).

    The average Grotesque Guardian kill is worth 55,188. If the player does not receive a unique drop, the average kill is worth only 47,762.

    In addition to the tradable loot, players have a guaranteed drop of 50 to 100 granite dust per kill. The dust can be used to increase the maximum hit of cannonballs from 30 to 35.

    Strategy

    See the Grotesque Guardians article and the strategy guide for additional information.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
    v • d • e
